greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: The characteristic function of primes > 3: 1 if n is prime such that neither prime+-1 is prime else 0.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1001
formula: If n > 3, a(n) = A010051(n), otherwise a(n) = 0. - _Antti Karttunen_, Oct 04 2017
results.author: _Juri-Stepan Gerasimov_, Dec 07 2009
